pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast, Compact Iterators and Tools // A fresh take on iterators in R. Designed to be cross-compatible with the 'iterators' package, but using the 'nextOr' method will offer better performance as well as more compact code. With batteries included: includes a collection of iterator constructors and combinators ported and refined from the 'iterators', 'itertools', and 'itertools2' packages.
